column2: an A.M. Eatery////Parking wasn't too bad
column3: we had to park in a Jack in the box across the street which had loads of spaces. I will say the only annoying thing about snooze is the wait
column4: yet it's understandable because of its popularity. We went on a weekday so the wait time was for only 45 mins
column5: plus they gave us free pancakes to compensate for the time!
